ruleArticles:
<js>
  json=[];
  if(baseUrl.match(/★/)){
  list=baseUrl.replace(/http.*?wd=\s*/,'').split('★');
  for(i in list){
  href=list[i].match(/【(.*?)】/)[1];
  text=list[i].match(/《(.*?)》/)[1];
  intro=list[i].match(/◎(.*?)◎/)[1];
  indexUrl=list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)?list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)[1]:list[i].match(/^(.*?)【/)[1]
  if(indexUrl.indexOf('https://xiang-shiwang.gitee.io')!=-1 || indexUrl.indexOf('http://xiang-shiwang.gitee.io')!=-1){
     if(indexUrl.indexOf('?')==-1){
      indexUrl+='?vTime='+new Date().getTime()
      }else{
          indexUrl+='&vTime='+new Date().getTime()
      } 
  }
  json.push({text:text,src:href,intro:intro,index:indexUrl})
  }
  }
  JSON.stringify(json)</js>
  $.[*]
